Package sample.DatabaseAccess

Class AppointmentDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.DatabaseAccess.AppointmentDatabase
  • public class AppointmentDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the interface between the Appointments class and the sql database.

    • Method Detail

      • getAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointments()
                                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is in charge of getting all appointments. This method returns an observable list contain all appointments extracted from the sql database.
        Returns:
        This returns the appointments list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - This will throw SQLExceptions.

      • addAppointment

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String description,
                                  java.lang.String location,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  int contactID,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime ends,
                                  int customerID,
                                  int userID,
                                  java.lang.String createdBy,
                                  java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is in charge of adding an appointment. This method collects different variables to create a new appointment record in the sql database.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the appointment.
        description - The description of the appointment.
        location - The location of the appointment.
        type - The type of appointment.
        contactID - The contactID of the contact.
        start - The start time and date of the appointment.
        ends - Then end time and date of the appointment.
        customerID - The customer ID of the customer.
        userID - The user ID of the user.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - This will throw SQLException.

      • updateAppointments

        public static void updateAppointments​(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String description,
                                      java.lang.String location,
                                      java.lang.String types,
                                      int contactID,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                      int customerID,
                                      int userID,
                                      int appointmentID)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is in charge of updating appointments. This method collects variables that will be used to update a certain appointment located by the appointment ID.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the appointment.
        description - The description of the appointment.
        location - The location of the appointment.
        types - The type of appointment.
        contactID - The contactID of the contact.
        start - The start time and date of the appointment.
        end - Then end time and date of the appointment.
        customerID - The customer ID of the customer.
        userID - The user ID of the user.
        appointmentID - The ID of the appointment.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - This will throw SQLException.

      • deleteAppointment

        public static void deleteAppointment​(int appointmentId)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is in charge of the deletion of an appointment. This method deletes an appointment from the sql database by searching for a corresponding appointment ID.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - This variable contains the ID of the corresponding appointment that is going to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - This will throw SQLExceptions.

      • getAppointmentSchedules

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentSchedules​(int contactID)
                                                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is in charge of returning certain appointment schedules. This method is passed an integer value that represents a contact's ID. The corresponding appointment schedules related to a certain contact is returned as an observable appointment list.
        Parameters:
        contactID - This is the ID of a certain contact.
        Returns:
        The appointment list is returned.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - This will throw SQLException.

      • getAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointments​(int userId)
                                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is in charge of returning certain user's appointments. This method is passed and integer value that represents a user's ID. The database is searched for appointments related to that certain user. These appointments are returned in the form of an observable list.
        Parameters:
        userId - This is the ID of a certain user.
        Returns:
        This will return an observable appointment list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - This will throw SQLExceptions.
